00019 "typedef unsigned int u32;\n"
00020 "#define GET_GROUP_IDX get_group_id(0)\n"
00021 "#define GET_LOCAL_IDX get_local_id(0)\n"
00022 "#define GET_GLOBAL_IDX get_global_id(0)\n"
00023 "#define GET_GROUP_SIZE get_local_size(0)\n"
00024 "#define GROUP_LDS_BARRIER barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE)\n"
00025 "#define GROUP_MEM_FENCE mem_fence(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE)\n"
00026 "#define AtomInc(x) atom_inc(&(x))\n"
00027 "#define AtomInc1(x, out) out = atom_inc(&(x))\n"
00028 "#define AtomAdd(x, value) atom_add(&(x), value)\n"
00029 "#define SELECT_UINT4( b, a, condition ) select( b,a,condition )\n"
00030 "#define make_uint4 (uint4)\n"
00031 "#define make_uint2 (uint2)\n"
00032 "#define make_int2 (int2)\n"
00033 "#define WG_SIZE 64\n"
00034 "#define ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM (256/WG_SIZE)\n"
00035 "#define BITS_PER_PASS 4\n"
00036 "#define NUM_BUCKET (1<<BITS_PER_PASS)\n"
00037 "typedef uchar u8;\n"
00038 "//     this isn't optimization for VLIW. But just reducing writes. \n"
00039 "#define USE_2LEVEL_REDUCE 1\n"
00040 "//#define CHECK_BOUNDARY 1\n"
00041 "//#define NV_GPU 1\n"
00042 "//     Cypress\n"
00043 "#define nPerWI 16\n"
00044 "//     Cayman\n"

00046 "#define m_n x\n"
00047 "#define m_nWGs y\n"
00048 "#define m_startBit z\n"
00049 "#define m_nBlocksPerWG w\n"

00051 "typedef struct\n"

00053 "       int m_n;\n"
00054 "       int m_nWGs;\n"
00055 "       int m_startBit;\n"
00056 "       int m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"

00059 "typedef struct\n"
00060 "{\n"
00061 "       unsigned int m_key;\n"
00062 "       unsigned int m_value;\n"
00063 "} SortDataCL;\n"
00064 "uint prefixScanVectorEx( uint4* data )\n"
00065 "{\n"
00066 "       u32 sum = 0;\n"
00067 "       u32 tmp = data[0].x;\n"
00068 "       data[0].x = sum;\n"
00069 "       sum += tmp;\n"
00070 "       tmp = data[0].y;\n"
00071 "       data[0].y = sum;\n"
00072 "       sum += tmp;\n"
00073 "       tmp = data[0].z;\n"
00074 "       data[0].z = sum;\n"
00075 "       sum += tmp;\n"
00076 "       tmp = data[0].w;\n"
00077 "       data[0].w = sum;\n"
00078 "       sum += tmp;\n"
00079 "       return sum;\n"
00080 "}\n"
00081 "u32 localPrefixSum( u32 pData, uint lIdx, uint* totalSum, __local u32* sorterSharedMemory, int wgSize /*64 or 128*/ )\n"
00082 "{\n"
00083 "       {       //      Set data\n"
00084 "               sorterSharedMemory[lIdx] = 0;\n"
00085 "               sorterSharedMemory[lIdx+wgSize] = pData;\n"
00086 "       }\n"
00087 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00088 "       {       //      Prefix sum\n"
00089 "               int idx = 2*lIdx + (wgSize+1);\n"
00090 "#if defined(USE_2LEVEL_REDUCE)\n"
00091 "               if( lIdx < 64 )\n"
00092 "               {\n"
00093 "                       u32 u0, u1, u2;\n"
00094 "                       u0 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-3];\n"
00095 "                       u1 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-2];\n"
00096 "                       u2 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-1];\n"
00097 "                       AtomAdd( sorterSharedMemory[idx], u0+u1+u2 );                   \n"
00098 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00099 "                       u0 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-12];\n"
00100 "                       u1 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-8];\n"
00101 "                       u2 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-4];\n"
00102 "                       AtomAdd( sorterSharedMemory[idx], u0+u1+u2 );                   \n"
00103 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00104 "                       u0 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-48];\n"
00105 "                       u1 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-32];\n"
00106 "                       u2 = sorterSharedMemory[idx-16];\n"
00107 "                       AtomAdd( sorterSharedMemory[idx], u0+u1+u2 );                   \n"
00108 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00109 "                       if( wgSize > 64 )\n"
00110 "                       {\n"
00111 "                               sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-64];\n"
00112 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00113 "                       }\n"
00114 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx-1] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-2];\n"
00115 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00116 "               }\n"
00117 "#else\n"
00118 "               if( lIdx < 64 )\n"
00119 "               {\n"
00120 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-1];\n"
00121 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00122 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-2];                   \n"
00123 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00124 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-4];\n"
00125 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00126 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-8];\n"
00127 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00128 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-16];\n"
00129 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00130 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-32];\n"
00131 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00132 "                       if( wgSize > 64 )\n"
00133 "                       {\n"
00134 "                               sorterSharedMemory[idx] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-64];\n"
00135 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00136 "                       }\n"
00137 "                       sorterSharedMemory[idx-1] += sorterSharedMemory[idx-2];\n"
00138 "                       GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00139 "               }\n"
00140 "#endif\n"
00141 "       }\n"
00142 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00143 "       *totalSum = sorterSharedMemory[wgSize*2-1];\n"
00144 "       u32 addValue = sorterSharedMemory[lIdx+wgSize-1];\n"
00145 "       return addValue;\n"
00146 "}\n"
00147 "//__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(128,1,1)))\n"
00148 "uint4 localPrefixSum128V( uint4 pData, uint lIdx, uint* totalSum, __local u32* sorterSharedMemory )\n"
00149 "{\n"
00150 "       u32 s4 = prefixScanVectorEx( &pData );\n"
00151 "       u32 rank = localPrefixSum( s4, lIdx, totalSum, sorterSharedMemory, 128 );\n"
00152 "       return pData + make_uint4( rank, rank, rank, rank );\n"
00153 "}\n"
00154 "//__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(64,1,1)))\n"
00155 "uint4 localPrefixSum64V( uint4 pData, uint lIdx, uint* totalSum, __local u32* sorterSharedMemory )\n"
00156 "{\n"
00157 "       u32 s4 = prefixScanVectorEx( &pData );\n"
00158 "       u32 rank = localPrefixSum( s4, lIdx, totalSum, sorterSharedMemory, 64 );\n"
00159 "       return pData + make_uint4( rank, rank, rank, rank );\n"
00160 "}\n"
00161 "u32 unpack4Key( u32 key, int keyIdx ){ return (key>>(keyIdx*8)) & 0xff;}\n"
00162 "u32 bit8Scan(u32 v)\n"
00163 "{\n"
00164 "       return (v<<8) + (v<<16) + (v<<24);\n"
00165 "}\n"
00166 "//===\n"
00167 "#define MY_HISTOGRAM(idx) localHistogramMat[(idx)*WG_SIZE+lIdx]\n"
00168 "__kernel\n"
00169 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00170 "void StreamCountKernel( __global u32* gSrc, __global u32* histogramOut, int4 cb )\n"
00171 "{\n"
00172 "       __local u32 localHistogramMat[NUM_BUCKET*WG_SIZE];\n"
00173 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00174 "       u32 lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00175 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00176 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00177 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00178 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00179 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00180 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00181 "       for(int i=0; i<NUM_BUCKET; i++)\n"
00182 "       {\n"
00183 "               MY_HISTOGRAM(i) = 0;\n"
00184 "       }\n"
00185 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00186 "       const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00187 "       u32 localKey;\n"
00188 "       int nBlocks = (n)/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00189 "       int addr = blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00190 "       for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++, addr+=blockSize)\n"
00191 "       {\n"
00192 "               //      MY_HISTOGRAM( localKeys.x ) ++ is much expensive than atomic add as it requires read and write while atomics can just add on AMD\n"
00193 "               //      Using registers didn't perform well. It seems like use localKeys to address requires a lot of alu ops\n"
00194 "               //      AMD: AtomInc performs better while NV prefers ++\n"
00195 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00196 "               {\n"
00197 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00198 "                       if( addr+i < n )\n"
00199 "#endif\n"
00200 "                       {\n"
00201 "                               localKey = (gSrc[addr+i]>>startBit) & 0xf;\n"
00202 "#if defined(NV_GPU)\n"
00203 "                               MY_HISTOGRAM( localKey )++;\n"
00204 "#else\n"
00205 "                               AtomInc( MY_HISTOGRAM( localKey ) );\n"
00206 "#endif\n"
00207 "                       }\n"
00208 "               }\n"
00209 "       }\n"
00210 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00211 "       \n"
00212 "       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00213 "       {\n"
00214 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00215 "               for(int i=0; i<GET_GROUP_SIZE; i++)\n"
00216 "               {\n"
00217 "                       sum += localHistogramMat[lIdx*WG_SIZE+(i+lIdx)%GET_GROUP_SIZE];\n"
00218 "               }\n"
00219 "               histogramOut[lIdx*nWGs+wgIdx] = sum;\n"
00220 "       }\n"
00221 "}\n"
00222 "__kernel\n"
00223 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00224 "void StreamCountSortDataKernel( __global SortDataCL* gSrc, __global u32* histogramOut, int4  cb )\n"
00225 "{\n"
00226 "       __local u32 localHistogramMat[NUM_BUCKET*WG_SIZE];\n"
00227 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00228 "       u32 lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00229 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00230 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00231 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00232 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00233 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00234 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00235 "       for(int i=0; i<NUM_BUCKET; i++)\n"
00236 "       {\n"
00237 "               MY_HISTOGRAM(i) = 0;\n"
00238 "       }\n"
00239 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00240 "       const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00241 "       u32 localKey;\n"
00242 "       int nBlocks = (n)/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00243 "       int addr = blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00244 "       for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++, addr+=blockSize)\n"
00245 "       {\n"
00246 "               //      MY_HISTOGRAM( localKeys.x ) ++ is much expensive than atomic add as it requires read and write while atomics can just add on AMD\n"
00247 "               //      Using registers didn't perform well. It seems like use localKeys to address requires a lot of alu ops\n"
00248 "               //      AMD: AtomInc performs better while NV prefers ++\n"
00249 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00250 "               {\n"
00251 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00252 "                       if( addr+i < n )\n"
00253 "#endif\n"
00254 "                       {\n"
00255 "                               localKey = (gSrc[addr+i].m_key>>startBit) & 0xf;\n"
00256 "#if defined(NV_GPU)\n"
00257 "                               MY_HISTOGRAM( localKey )++;\n"
00258 "#else\n"
00259 "                               AtomInc( MY_HISTOGRAM( localKey ) );\n"
00260 "#endif\n"
00261 "                       }\n"
00262 "               }\n"
00263 "       }\n"
00264 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00265 "       \n"
00266 "       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00267 "       {\n"
00268 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00269 "               for(int i=0; i<GET_GROUP_SIZE; i++)\n"
00270 "               {\n"
00271 "                       sum += localHistogramMat[lIdx*WG_SIZE+(i+lIdx)%GET_GROUP_SIZE];\n"
00272 "               }\n"
00273 "               histogramOut[lIdx*nWGs+wgIdx] = sum;\n"
00274 "       }\n"
00275 "}\n"
00276 "#define nPerLane (nPerWI/4)\n"
00277 "//     NUM_BUCKET*nWGs < 128*nPerWI\n"
00278 "__kernel\n"
00279 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(128,1,1)))\n"
00280 "void PrefixScanKernel( __global u32* wHistogram1, int4  cb )\n"
00281 "{\n"
00282 "       __local u32 ldsTopScanData[128*2];\n"
00283 "       u32 lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00284 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00285 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00286 "       u32 data[nPerWI];\n"
00287 "       for(int i=0; i<nPerWI; i++)\n"
00288 "       {\n"
00289 "               data[i] = 0;\n"
00290 "               if( (nPerWI*lIdx+i) < NUM_BUCKET*nWGs )\n"
00291 "                       data[i] = wHistogram1[nPerWI*lIdx+i];\n"
00292 "       }\n"
00293 "       uint4 myData = make_uint4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00294 "       for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00295 "       {\n"
00296 "               myData.x += data[nPerLane*0+i];\n"
00297 "               myData.y += data[nPerLane*1+i];\n"
00298 "               myData.z += data[nPerLane*2+i];\n"
00299 "               myData.w += data[nPerLane*3+i];\n"
00300 "       }\n"
00301 "       uint totalSum;\n"
00302 "       uint4 scanned = localPrefixSum128V( myData, lIdx, &totalSum, ldsTopScanData );\n"
00303 "//     for(int j=0; j<4; j++) //       somehow it introduces a lot of branches\n"
00304 "       {       int j = 0;\n"
00305 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00306 "               for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00307 "               {\n"
00308 "                       u32 tmp = data[nPerLane*j+i];\n"
00309 "                       data[nPerLane*j+i] = sum;\n"
00310 "                       sum += tmp;\n"
00311 "               }\n"
00312 "       }\n"
00313 "       {       int j = 1;\n"
00314 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00315 "               for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00316 "               {\n"
00317 "                       u32 tmp = data[nPerLane*j+i];\n"
00318 "                       data[nPerLane*j+i] = sum;\n"
00319 "                       sum += tmp;\n"
00320 "               }\n"
00321 "       }\n"
00322 "       {       int j = 2;\n"
00323 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00324 "               for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00325 "               {\n"
00326 "                       u32 tmp = data[nPerLane*j+i];\n"
00327 "                       data[nPerLane*j+i] = sum;\n"
00328 "                       sum += tmp;\n"
00329 "               }\n"
00330 "       }\n"
00331 "       {       int j = 3;\n"
00332 "               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00333 "               for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00334 "               {\n"
00335 "                       u32 tmp = data[nPerLane*j+i];\n"
00336 "                       data[nPerLane*j+i] = sum;\n"
00337 "                       sum += tmp;\n"
00338 "               }\n"
00339 "       }\n"
00340 "       for(int i=0; i<nPerLane; i++)\n"
00341 "       {\n"
00342 "               data[nPerLane*0+i] += scanned.x;\n"
00343 "               data[nPerLane*1+i] += scanned.y;\n"
00344 "               data[nPerLane*2+i] += scanned.z;\n"
00345 "               data[nPerLane*3+i] += scanned.w;\n"
00346 "       }\n"
00347 "       for(int i=0; i<nPerWI; i++)\n"
00348 "       {\n"
00349 "               int index = nPerWI*lIdx+i;\n"
00350 "               if (index < NUM_BUCKET*nWGs)\n"
00351 "                       wHistogram1[nPerWI*lIdx+i] = data[i];\n"
00352 "       }\n"
00353 "}\n"
00354 "//     4 scan, 4 exchange\n"
00355 "void sort4Bits(u32 sortData[4], int startBit, int lIdx, __local u32* ldsSortData)\n"
00356 "{\n"
00357 "       for(int bitIdx=0; bitIdx<BITS_PER_PASS; bitIdx++)\n"
00358 "       {\n"
00359 "               u32 mask = (1<<bitIdx);\n"
00360 "               uint4 cmpResult = make_uint4( (sortData[0]>>startBit) & mask, (sortData[1]>>startBit) & mask, (sortData[2]>>startBit) & mask, (sortData[3]>>startBit) & mask );\n"
00361 "               uint4 prefixSum = SELECT_UINT4( make_uint4(1,1,1,1), make_uint4(0,0,0,0), cmpResult != make_uint4(0,0,0,0) );\n"
00362 "               u32 total;\n"
00363 "               prefixSum = localPrefixSum64V( prefixSum, lIdx, &total, ldsSortData );\n"
00364 "               {\n"
00365 "                       uint4 localAddr = make_uint4(lIdx*4+0,lIdx*4+1,lIdx*4+2,lIdx*4+3);\n"
00366 "                       uint4 dstAddr = localAddr - prefixSum + make_uint4( total, total, total, total );\n"
00367 "                       dstAddr = SELECT_UINT4( prefixSum, dstAddr, cmpResult != make_uint4(0, 0, 0, 0) );\n"
00368 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00369 "                       ldsSortData[dstAddr.x] = sortData[0];\n"
00370 "                       ldsSortData[dstAddr.y] = sortData[1];\n"
00371 "                       ldsSortData[dstAddr.z] = sortData[2];\n"
00372 "                       ldsSortData[dstAddr.w] = sortData[3];\n"
00373 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00374 "                       sortData[0] = ldsSortData[localAddr.x];\n"
00375 "                       sortData[1] = ldsSortData[localAddr.y];\n"
00376 "                       sortData[2] = ldsSortData[localAddr.z];\n"
00377 "                       sortData[3] = ldsSortData[localAddr.w];\n"
00378 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00379 "               }\n"
00380 "       }\n"
00381 "}\n"
00382 "//     2 scan, 2 exchange\n"
00383 "void sort4Bits1(u32 sortData[4], int startBit, int lIdx, __local u32* ldsSortData)\n"
00384 "{\n"
00385 "       for(uint ibit=0; ibit<BITS_PER_PASS; ibit+=2)\n"
00386 "       {\n"
00387 "               uint4 b = make_uint4((sortData[0]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00388 "                       (sortData[1]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00389 "                       (sortData[2]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00390 "                       (sortData[3]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3);\n"
00391 "               u32 key4;\n"
00392 "               u32 sKeyPacked[4] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };\n"
00393 "               {\n"
00394 "                       sKeyPacked[0] |= 1<<(8*b.x);\n"
00395 "                       sKeyPacked[1] |= 1<<(8*b.y);\n"
00396 "                       sKeyPacked[2] |= 1<<(8*b.z);\n"
00397 "                       sKeyPacked[3] |= 1<<(8*b.w);\n"
00398 "                       key4 = sKeyPacked[0] + sKeyPacked[1] + sKeyPacked[2] + sKeyPacked[3];\n"
00399 "               }\n"
00400 "               u32 rankPacked;\n"
00401 "               u32 sumPacked;\n"
00402 "               {\n"
00403 "                       rankPacked = localPrefixSum( key4, lIdx, &sumPacked, ldsSortData, WG_SIZE );\n"
00404 "               }\n"
00405 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00406 "               u32 newOffset[4] = { 0,0,0,0 };\n"
00407 "               {\n"
00408 "                       u32 sumScanned = bit8Scan( sumPacked );\n"
00409 "                       u32 scannedKeys[4];\n"
00410 "                       scannedKeys[0] = 1<<(8*b.x);\n"
00411 "                       scannedKeys[1] = 1<<(8*b.y);\n"
00412 "                       scannedKeys[2] = 1<<(8*b.z);\n"
00413 "                       scannedKeys[3] = 1<<(8*b.w);\n"
00414 "                       {       //      4 scans at once\n"
00415 "                               u32 sum4 = 0;\n"
00416 "                               for(int ie=0; ie<4; ie++)\n"
00417 "                               {\n"
00418 "                                       u32 tmp = scannedKeys[ie];\n"
00419 "                                       scannedKeys[ie] = sum4;\n"
00420 "                                       sum4 += tmp;\n"
00421 "                               }\n"
00422 "                       }\n"
00423 "                       {\n"
00424 "                               u32 sumPlusRank = sumScanned + rankPacked;\n"
00425 "                               {       u32 ie = b.x;\n"
00426 "                                       scannedKeys[0] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00427 "                                       newOffset[0] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[0], ie );\n"
00428 "                               }\n"
00429 "                               {       u32 ie = b.y;\n"
00430 "                                       scannedKeys[1] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00431 "                                       newOffset[1] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[1], ie );\n"
00432 "                               }\n"
00433 "                               {       u32 ie = b.z;\n"
00434 "                                       scannedKeys[2] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00435 "                                       newOffset[2] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[2], ie );\n"
00436 "                               }\n"
00437 "                               {       u32 ie = b.w;\n"
00438 "                                       scannedKeys[3] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00439 "                                       newOffset[3] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[3], ie );\n"
00440 "                               }\n"
00441 "                       }\n"
00442 "               }\n"
00443 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00444 "               {\n"
00445 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[0]] = sortData[0];\n"
00446 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[1]] = sortData[1];\n"
00447 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[2]] = sortData[2];\n"
00448 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[3]] = sortData[3];\n"
00449 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00450 "                       u32 dstAddr = 4*lIdx;\n"
00451 "                       sortData[0] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+0];\n"
00452 "                       sortData[1] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+1];\n"
00453 "                       sortData[2] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+2];\n"
00454 "                       sortData[3] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+3];\n"
00455 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00456 "               }\n"
00457 "       }\n"
00458 "}\n"
00459 "#define SET_HISTOGRAM(setIdx, key) ldsSortData[(setIdx)*NUM_BUCKET+key]\n"
00460 "__kernel\n"
00461 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00462 "void SortAndScatterKernel( __global const u32* restrict gSrc, __global const u32* rHistogram, __global u32* restrict gDst, int4  cb )\n"
00463 "{\n"
00464 "       __local u32 ldsSortData[WG_SIZE*ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM+16];\n"
00465 "       __local u32 localHistogramToCarry[NUM_BUCKET];\n"
00466 "       __local u32 localHistogram[NUM_BUCKET*2];\n"
00467 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00468 "       u32 lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00469 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00470 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00471 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00472 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00473 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00474 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00475 "       if( lIdx < (NUM_BUCKET) )\n"
00476 "       {\n"
00477 "               localHistogramToCarry[lIdx] = rHistogram[lIdx*nWGs + wgIdx];\n"
00478 "       }\n"
00479 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00480 "       const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00481 "       int nBlocks = n/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00482 "       int addr = blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00483 "       for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++, addr+=blockSize)\n"
00484 "       {\n"
00485 "               u32 myHistogram = 0;\n"
00486 "               u32 sortData[ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM];\n"
00487 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00488 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00489 "                       sortData[i] = ( addr+i < n )? gSrc[ addr+i ] : 0xffffffff;\n"
00490 "#else\n"
00491 "                       sortData[i] = gSrc[ addr+i ];\n"
00492 "#endif\n"
00493 "               sort4Bits(sortData, startBit, lIdx, ldsSortData);\n"
00494 "               u32 keys[ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM];\n"
00495 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00496 "                       keys[i] = (sortData[i]>>startBit) & 0xf;\n"
00497 "               {       //      create histogram\n"
00498 "                       u32 setIdx = lIdx/16;\n"
00499 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00500 "                       {\n"
00501 "                               localHistogram[lIdx] = 0;\n"
00502 "                       }\n"
00503 "                       ldsSortData[lIdx] = 0;\n"
00504 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00505 "                       for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00506 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00507 "                               if( addr+i < n )\n"
00508 "#endif\n"
00509 "#if defined(NV_GPU)\n"
00510 "                               SET_HISTOGRAM( setIdx, keys[i] )++;\n"
00511 "#else\n"
00512 "                               AtomInc( SET_HISTOGRAM( setIdx, keys[i] ) );\n"
00513 "#endif\n"
00514 "                       \n"
00515 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00516 "                       \n"
00517 "                       uint hIdx = NUM_BUCKET+lIdx;\n"
00518 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00519 "                       {\n"
00520 "                               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00521 "                               for(int i=0; i<WG_SIZE/16; i++)\n"
00522 "                               {\n"
00523 "                                       sum += SET_HISTOGRAM( i, lIdx );\n"
00524 "                               }\n"
00525 "                               myHistogram = sum;\n"
00526 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = sum;\n"
00527 "                       }\n"
00528 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00529 "#if defined(USE_2LEVEL_REDUCE)\n"
00530 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00531 "                       {\n"
00532 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00533 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00534 "                               u32 u0, u1, u2;\n"
00535 "                               u0 = localHistogram[hIdx-3];\n"
00536 "                               u1 = localHistogram[hIdx-2];\n"
00537 "                               u2 = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00538 "                               AtomAdd( localHistogram[hIdx], u0 + u1 + u2 );\n"
00539 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00540 "                               u0 = localHistogram[hIdx-12];\n"
00541 "                               u1 = localHistogram[hIdx-8];\n"
00542 "                               u2 = localHistogram[hIdx-4];\n"
00543 "                               AtomAdd( localHistogram[hIdx], u0 + u1 + u2 );\n"
00544 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00545 "                       }\n"
00546 "#else\n"
00547 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00548 "                       {\n"
00549 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00550 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00551 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00552 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00553 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-2];\n"
00554 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00555 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-4];\n"
00556 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00557 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-8];\n"
00558 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00559 "                       }\n"
00560 "#endif\n"
00561 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00562 "               }\n"
00563 "               {\n"
00564 "                       for(int ie=0; ie<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; ie++)\n"
00565 "                       {\n"
00566 "                               int dataIdx = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx+ie;\n"
00567 "                               int binIdx = keys[ie];\n"
00568 "                               int groupOffset = localHistogramToCarry[binIdx];\n"
00569 "                               int myIdx = dataIdx - localHistogram[NUM_BUCKET+binIdx];\n"
00570 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00571 "                               if( addr+ie < n )\n"
00572 "#endif\n"
00573 "                               gDst[ groupOffset + myIdx ] = sortData[ie];\n"
00574 "                       }\n"
00575 "               }\n"
00576 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00577 "               if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00578 "               {\n"
00579 "                       localHistogramToCarry[lIdx] += myHistogram;\n"
00580 "               }\n"
00581 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00582 "       }\n"
00583 "}\n"
00584 "//     2 scan, 2 exchange\n"
00585 "void sort4Bits1KeyValue(u32 sortData[4], int sortVal[4], int startBit, int lIdx, __local u32* ldsSortData, __local int *ldsSortVal)\n"
00586 "{\n"
00587 "       for(uint ibit=0; ibit<BITS_PER_PASS; ibit+=2)\n"
00588 "       {\n"
00589 "               uint4 b = make_uint4((sortData[0]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00590 "                       (sortData[1]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00591 "                       (sortData[2]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3, \n"
00592 "                       (sortData[3]>>(startBit+ibit)) & 0x3);\n"
00593 "               u32 key4;\n"
00594 "               u32 sKeyPacked[4] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };\n"
00595 "               {\n"
00596 "                       sKeyPacked[0] |= 1<<(8*b.x);\n"
00597 "                       sKeyPacked[1] |= 1<<(8*b.y);\n"
00598 "                       sKeyPacked[2] |= 1<<(8*b.z);\n"
00599 "                       sKeyPacked[3] |= 1<<(8*b.w);\n"
00600 "                       key4 = sKeyPacked[0] + sKeyPacked[1] + sKeyPacked[2] + sKeyPacked[3];\n"
00601 "               }\n"
00602 "               u32 rankPacked;\n"
00603 "               u32 sumPacked;\n"
00604 "               {\n"
00605 "                       rankPacked = localPrefixSum( key4, lIdx, &sumPacked, ldsSortData, WG_SIZE );\n"
00606 "               }\n"
00607 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00608 "               u32 newOffset[4] = { 0,0,0,0 };\n"
00609 "               {\n"
00610 "                       u32 sumScanned = bit8Scan( sumPacked );\n"
00611 "                       u32 scannedKeys[4];\n"
00612 "                       scannedKeys[0] = 1<<(8*b.x);\n"
00613 "                       scannedKeys[1] = 1<<(8*b.y);\n"
00614 "                       scannedKeys[2] = 1<<(8*b.z);\n"
00615 "                       scannedKeys[3] = 1<<(8*b.w);\n"
00616 "                       {       //      4 scans at once\n"
00617 "                               u32 sum4 = 0;\n"
00618 "                               for(int ie=0; ie<4; ie++)\n"
00619 "                               {\n"
00620 "                                       u32 tmp = scannedKeys[ie];\n"
00621 "                                       scannedKeys[ie] = sum4;\n"
00622 "                                       sum4 += tmp;\n"
00623 "                               }\n"
00624 "                       }\n"
00625 "                       {\n"
00626 "                               u32 sumPlusRank = sumScanned + rankPacked;\n"
00627 "                               {       u32 ie = b.x;\n"
00628 "                                       scannedKeys[0] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00629 "                                       newOffset[0] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[0], ie );\n"
00630 "                               }\n"
00631 "                               {       u32 ie = b.y;\n"
00632 "                                       scannedKeys[1] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00633 "                                       newOffset[1] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[1], ie );\n"
00634 "                               }\n"
00635 "                               {       u32 ie = b.z;\n"
00636 "                                       scannedKeys[2] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00637 "                                       newOffset[2] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[2], ie );\n"
00638 "                               }\n"
00639 "                               {       u32 ie = b.w;\n"
00640 "                                       scannedKeys[3] += sumPlusRank;\n"
00641 "                                       newOffset[3] = unpack4Key( scannedKeys[3], ie );\n"
00642 "                               }\n"
00643 "                       }\n"
00644 "               }\n"
00645 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00646 "               {\n"
00647 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[0]] = sortData[0];\n"
00648 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[1]] = sortData[1];\n"
00649 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[2]] = sortData[2];\n"
00650 "                       ldsSortData[newOffset[3]] = sortData[3];\n"
00651 "                       ldsSortVal[newOffset[0]] = sortVal[0];\n"
00652 "                       ldsSortVal[newOffset[1]] = sortVal[1];\n"
00653 "                       ldsSortVal[newOffset[2]] = sortVal[2];\n"
00654 "                       ldsSortVal[newOffset[3]] = sortVal[3];\n"
00655 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00656 "                       u32 dstAddr = 4*lIdx;\n"
00657 "                       sortData[0] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+0];\n"
00658 "                       sortData[1] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+1];\n"
00659 "                       sortData[2] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+2];\n"
00660 "                       sortData[3] = ldsSortData[dstAddr+3];\n"
00661 "                       sortVal[0] = ldsSortVal[dstAddr+0];\n"
00662 "                       sortVal[1] = ldsSortVal[dstAddr+1];\n"
00663 "                       sortVal[2] = ldsSortVal[dstAddr+2];\n"
00664 "                       sortVal[3] = ldsSortVal[dstAddr+3];\n"
00665 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00666 "               }\n"
00667 "       }\n"
00668 "}\n"
00669 "__kernel\n"
00670 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00671 "void SortAndScatterSortDataKernel( __global const SortDataCL* restrict gSrc, __global const u32* rHistogram, __global SortDataCL* restrict gDst, int4 cb)\n"
00672 "{\n"
00673 "       __local int ldsSortData[WG_SIZE*ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM+16];\n"
00674 "       __local int ldsSortVal[WG_SIZE*ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM+16];\n"
00675 "       __local u32 localHistogramToCarry[NUM_BUCKET];\n"
00676 "       __local u32 localHistogram[NUM_BUCKET*2];\n"
00677 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00678 "       u32 lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00679 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00680 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00681 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00682 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00683 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00684 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00685 "       if( lIdx < (NUM_BUCKET) )\n"
00686 "       {\n"
00687 "               localHistogramToCarry[lIdx] = rHistogram[lIdx*nWGs + wgIdx];\n"
00688 "       }\n"
00689 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00690 "    \n"
00691 "       const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00692 "       int nBlocks = n/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00693 "       int addr = blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00694 "       for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++, addr+=blockSize)\n"
00695 "       {\n"
00696 "               u32 myHistogram = 0;\n"
00697 "               int sortData[ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM];\n"
00698 "               int sortVal[ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM];\n"
00699 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00700 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00701 "               {\n"
00702 "                       sortData[i] = ( addr+i < n )? gSrc[ addr+i ].m_key : 0xffffffff;\n"
00703 "                       sortVal[i] = ( addr+i < n )? gSrc[ addr+i ].m_value : 0xffffffff;\n"
00704 "               }\n"
00705 "#else\n"
00706 "               {\n"
00707 "                       sortData[i] = gSrc[ addr+i ].m_key;\n"
00708 "                       sortVal[i] = gSrc[ addr+i ].m_value;\n"
00709 "               }\n"
00710 "#endif\n"
00711 "               sort4Bits1KeyValue(sortData, sortVal, startBit, lIdx, ldsSortData, ldsSortVal);\n"
00712 "               u32 keys[ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM];\n"
00713 "               for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00714 "                       keys[i] = (sortData[i]>>startBit) & 0xf;\n"
00715 "               {       //      create histogram\n"
00716 "                       u32 setIdx = lIdx/16;\n"
00717 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00718 "                       {\n"
00719 "                               localHistogram[lIdx] = 0;\n"
00720 "                       }\n"
00721 "                       ldsSortData[lIdx] = 0;\n"
00722 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00723 "                       for(int i=0; i<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; i++)\n"
00724 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00725 "                               if( addr+i < n )\n"
00726 "#endif\n"
00727 "#if defined(NV_GPU)\n"
00728 "                               SET_HISTOGRAM( setIdx, keys[i] )++;\n"
00729 "#else\n"
00730 "                               AtomInc( SET_HISTOGRAM( setIdx, keys[i] ) );\n"
00731 "#endif\n"
00732 "                       \n"
00733 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00734 "                       \n"
00735 "                       uint hIdx = NUM_BUCKET+lIdx;\n"
00736 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00737 "                       {\n"
00738 "                               u32 sum = 0;\n"
00739 "                               for(int i=0; i<WG_SIZE/16; i++)\n"
00740 "                               {\n"
00741 "                                       sum += SET_HISTOGRAM( i, lIdx );\n"
00742 "                               }\n"
00743 "                               myHistogram = sum;\n"
00744 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = sum;\n"
00745 "                       }\n"
00746 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00747 "#if defined(USE_2LEVEL_REDUCE)\n"
00748 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00749 "                       {\n"
00750 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00751 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00752 "                               u32 u0, u1, u2;\n"
00753 "                               u0 = localHistogram[hIdx-3];\n"
00754 "                               u1 = localHistogram[hIdx-2];\n"
00755 "                               u2 = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00756 "                               AtomAdd( localHistogram[hIdx], u0 + u1 + u2 );\n"
00757 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00758 "                               u0 = localHistogram[hIdx-12];\n"
00759 "                               u1 = localHistogram[hIdx-8];\n"
00760 "                               u2 = localHistogram[hIdx-4];\n"
00761 "                               AtomAdd( localHistogram[hIdx], u0 + u1 + u2 );\n"
00762 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00763 "                       }\n"
00764 "#else\n"
00765 "                       if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00766 "                       {\n"
00767 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] = localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00768 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00769 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-1];\n"
00770 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00771 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-2];\n"
00772 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00773 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-4];\n"
00774 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00775 "                               localHistogram[hIdx] += localHistogram[hIdx-8];\n"
00776 "                               GROUP_MEM_FENCE;\n"
00777 "                       }\n"
00778 "#endif\n"
00779 "                       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00780 "               }\n"
00781 "       {\n"
00782 "                       for(int ie=0; ie<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; ie++)\n"
00783 "                       {\n"
00784 "                               int dataIdx = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx+ie;\n"
00785 "                               int binIdx = keys[ie];\n"
00786 "                               int groupOffset = localHistogramToCarry[binIdx];\n"
00787 "                               int myIdx = dataIdx - localHistogram[NUM_BUCKET+binIdx];\n"
00788 "#if defined(CHECK_BOUNDARY)\n"
00789 "                               if( addr+ie < n )\n"
00790 "                               {\n"
00791 "                    if ((groupOffset + myIdx)<n)\n"
00792 "                    {\n"
00793 "                        if (sortData[ie]==sortVal[ie])\n"
00794 "                        {\n"
00795 "                            \n"
00796 "                            SortDataCL tmp;\n"
00797 "                            tmp.m_key = sortData[ie];\n"
00798 "                            tmp.m_value = sortVal[ie];\n"
00799 "                            if (tmp.m_key == tmp.m_value)\n"
00800 "                                gDst[groupOffset + myIdx ] = tmp;\n"
00801 "                        }\n"
00802 "                        \n"
00803 "                    }\n"
00804 "                               }\n"
00805 "#else\n"
00806 "                if ((groupOffset + myIdx)<n)\n"
00807 "                {\n"
00808 "                    gDst[ groupOffset + myIdx ].m_key = sortData[ie];\n"
00809 "                    gDst[ groupOffset + myIdx ].m_value = sortVal[ie];\n"
00810 "                }\n"
00811 "#endif\n"
00812 "                       }\n"
00813 "               }\n"
00814 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00815 "               if( lIdx < NUM_BUCKET )\n"
00816 "               {\n"
00817 "                       localHistogramToCarry[lIdx] += myHistogram;\n"
00818 "               }\n"
00819 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00820 "       }\n"
00821 "}\n"
00822 "__kernel\n"
00823 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00824 "void SortAndScatterSortDataKernelSerial( __global const SortDataCL* restrict gSrc, __global const u32* rHistogram, __global SortDataCL* restrict gDst, int4 cb)\n"
00825 "{\n"
00826 "    \n"
00827 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00828 "       u32 realLocalIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00829 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00830 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00831 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00832 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00833 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00834 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00835 "    int counter[NUM_BUCKET];\n"
00836 "    \n"
00837 "    if (realLocalIdx>0)\n"
00838 "        return;\n"
00839 "    \n"
00840 "    for (int c=0;c<NUM_BUCKET;c++)\n"
00841 "        counter[c]=0;\n"
00842 "    const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00843 "       \n"
00844 "       int nBlocks = (n)/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00845 "   for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++)\n"
00846 "  {\n"
00847 "     for (int lIdx=0;lIdx<WG_SIZE;lIdx++)\n"
00848 "       {\n"
00849 "        int addr2 = iblock*blockSize + blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00850 "        \n"
00851 "               for(int j=0; j<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; j++)\n"
00852 "               {\n"
00853 "            int i = addr2+j;\n"
00854 "                       if( i < n )\n"
00855 "                       {\n"
00856 "                int tableIdx;\n"
00857 "                               tableIdx = (gSrc[i].m_key>>startBit) & 0xf;//0xf = NUM_TABLES-1\n"
00858 "                gDst[rHistogram[tableIdx*nWGs+wgIdx] + counter[tableIdx]] = gSrc[i];\n"
00859 "                counter[tableIdx] ++;\n"
00860 "                       }\n"
00861 "               }\n"
00862 "       }\n"
00863 "  }\n"
00864 "    \n"
00865 "}\n"
00866 "__kernel\n"
00867 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00868 "void SortAndScatterKernelSerial( __global const u32* restrict gSrc, __global const u32* rHistogram, __global u32* restrict gDst, int4  cb )\n"
00869 "{\n"
00870 "    \n"
00871 "       u32 gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00872 "       u32 realLocalIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00873 "       u32 wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00874 "       u32 wgSize = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00875 "       const int startBit = cb.m_startBit;\n"
00876 "       const int n = cb.m_n;\n"
00877 "       const int nWGs = cb.m_nWGs;\n"
00878 "       const int nBlocksPerWG = cb.m_nBlocksPerWG;\n"
00879 "    int counter[NUM_BUCKET];\n"
00880 "    \n"
00881 "    if (realLocalIdx>0)\n"
00882 "        return;\n"
00883 "    \n"
00884 "    for (int c=0;c<NUM_BUCKET;c++)\n"
00885 "        counter[c]=0;\n"
00886 "    const int blockSize = ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*WG_SIZE;\n"
00887 "       \n"
00888 "       int nBlocks = (n)/blockSize - nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx;\n"
00889 "   for(int iblock=0; iblock<min(nBlocksPerWG, nBlocks); iblock++)\n"
00890 "  {\n"
00891 "     for (int lIdx=0;lIdx<WG_SIZE;lIdx++)\n"
00892 "       {\n"
00893 "        int addr2 = iblock*blockSize + blockSize*nBlocksPerWG*wgIdx + ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM*lIdx;\n"
00894 "        \n"
00895 "               for(int j=0; j<ELEMENTS_PER_WORK_ITEM; j++)\n"
00896 "               {\n"
00897 "            int i = addr2+j;\n"
00898 "                       if( i < n )\n"
00899 "                       {\n"
00900 "                int tableIdx;\n"
00901 "                               tableIdx = (gSrc[i]>>startBit) & 0xf;//0xf = NUM_TABLES-1\n"
00902 "                gDst[rHistogram[tableIdx*nWGs+wgIdx] + counter[tableIdx]] = gSrc[i];\n"
00903 "                counter[tableIdx] ++;\n"
00904 "                       }\n"
00905 "               }\n"
00906 "       }\n"
00907 "  }\n"
00908 "    \n"
00909 "}\n"
00910 ;
